techniqueDifficultyExplanation: The technique difficulty of this workout is classified as Advanced due to the 'drive' workout type, which indicates a higher complexity similar to advanced rowing techniques that require good coordination and body awareness. Additionally, the inclusion of high-intensity intervals (HIIT) and a focus on proper form demanding advanced technique skills contribute to this rating.
effortDifficultyExplanation: This workout is highly demanding due to the HIIT format and 'drive' category, requiring participants to exert maximal effort in short bursts ('15-seconds at a time'). The workout is relatively short but intense, aligning with a Challenging effort level. The workout intensity level is maxed at 3 out of 3, suggesting it verges on Extreme for less conditioned users.
requiredFitnessLevelExplanation: The workoutType is 'Drive', which is explicitly defined as a Advanced workout based on platform rules. No further inference needed.
